rules_text:
Menace
{5}: Target player mills five cards, then you may cast a spell with mana value 5 or less from that player’s graveyard without paying its mana cost. Exile it if you do.
{5}, Exile Soul of Arkoph from your graveyard: Target player mills five cards, then you may cast a spell with mana value 5 or less from that player’s graveyard without paying its mana cost. Exile it if you do.
